programme.title: GONE WITH THE CHAI!
programme.desc: Its a very windy day and Sundar is having a tough time as Chai Raja sends him running in all directions- sometimes to throw more coconut fronds onto the rapidly diminishing roof, at other times to keep an especially thin customer from flying off! Basha only adds to his woes as Basha deliberately keeps undoing all that Sundar does just so that the poor waiter of Hotel California stays distracted enough and cant chase the bothersome Basha off the premises. Sundar tries tacking a tarpaulin sheet but Basha naughtily shifts it to the entrance where the tarpaulin sheet takes on a mind of its own and customers find themselves ushered/plonked into the shop in unorthodox manners. Sundar runs to take it down and is also caught up by the stormy tarpaulin sheet. Finally, Sundar has it stuffed into the closet but then he finds that the wind has weakened one of the wooden posts and the roof may fall any second on the tea-sippers. Sundar tries his own (bad) handyman skills and drill nails to hold up the post, but Bashas interference leads to the post crumbling entirely. Desperate, Sundar stands in place of the post, holding the roof up- Basha tickles & taunts Sundar and has a gala time. But the loyal Sundar sticks through it. Suddenly the storm seems to die and Sundar gingerly steps out of the spot- and quickly sticks in a pipe to hold up the roof it seems to be holding!! Relieved, he dashes to where Chai Raja has set out his supper and casually flicks a tiny baby coconut that had fallen in it aside...but this ricochets off the many already shaken up posts of the stall and in a trice the three posts of the stall are knocked down. The pipe creaks...then bends and as Sundar gulps, the last support of the roof too gives away and it comes crashing down! In the distance Basha chuckles and tucks in for the night.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: CHOR POLICE
programme.desc: One fine morning, an evidently pea-brained police constable comes to hotel Kelifornia with a smart thief handcuffed to his hand. Basha is absolutely enjoying the funny difficulties the policeman faces while having food with the thief handcuffed to his hand; while Sundar is all respect for the policemen. Basha decides to up the fun by making the policemens life miserable; and Sundar is in running around protecting the policemen. But he causes more trouble than help. The mayhem reaches a crescendo when the smart thief gets to runs away when the handcuff breaks in the madness and in his place Sundar gets handcuffed to the policeman. And a fuming policeman whacks Sundar and runs behind the thief!Basha laughs innocently basking in his successful mischief!

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Rest
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: TROUBLE HAS WHEELS
programme.desc: Chai Raja is super angry at Sundar for being so slow at work! Sundar really needs to pull up his act. That is when he finds an abandoned skateboard behind the shop. Now Sundar is the fastest waiter ever. After some disastrous starting troubles, Sundar is efficiently skating through the teashop serving customers. For once Chai Raja is a little happy with him. Basha comes for his usual round of theft. And he is encountered by a speedy Sundar. Basha finds it hard to outrun Sundar-on-wheels. Basha needs to up his game right away! And he does so effectively. What follows is a crazy rolling marathon throughout the shop. How will it end?!!!

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Pencil
programme.desc: After scribbling away lets come up with some fun DIY ideas

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Everyone's good at something
programme.desc: The twins meet a little Snowgirl who lacks self-esteem but they help her discover a hidden skill which makes her the hit of the ‘North Pole’s Got Talent’ competition.

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Socks
programme.desc: Not just to keep your feet warm, Hepi and Briko have some interesting sock themed ideas

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: Super Thomas
programme.desc: Fred gives Thomas the chance to feel like his idol, a comic book hero in a flying metal suit.

programme.title: What Goes Up…
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: Crushing Friday
programme.desc: Fred impresses his pals when he enters their favorite Robot Battle TV show (using Friday as his robot of course). When Friday demolishes the fan favorite however, instead of cheering Fred, they mourn “Speedy” the crushed bot. Brains rebuilds Speedy and her own girl robot, “Little Miss Missile Hands.”

programme.title: Fruits Of The Forest – Little Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Detective Sandra and her assistant Fo go to the tale of Little Red Riding Hood, having been called out by the Grandmother, whose knitting needles have mysteriously gone missing. Shortly after they arrive, and without Sandra realising it, the Wolf captures Fo and takes him to his lair in order to devour him. While Fo desperately uses his ingenuity - and a cookery book – to avoid becoming the wolf’s dinner, Sandra gets down to work in search of the knitting needles. The investigation will lead the detective to the Wolf’s lair, and thus she saves Fo. Sandra will also discover that Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf have reached an agreement to hide the knitting needles, because Little Red Riding Hood is sick of wearing the red hoods her grandmother knits for her.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: The Washed - Away Planet
programme.desc: Aladdin is entrusted to deliver a very precious necklace. When Jamillah arrives she knocks into him and out of worry for the necklace he opens the box but then it accidentally drops down a drain! He knows how expensive that necklace is, it would take him 20 years to earn enough to pay for it so he resigns himself to trying to find a job so that he can start earning the money back. Meanwhile Jamillah calls on Genie to help him get the necklace back and after some sifting around he finds it in the drain and Aladdin is able to deliver it on time.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Desde citas fallidas hasta encuentros inesperados y días difíciles, 3 amigas enfrentan los desafíos de la vida

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Una confusión con una bolsa llena de dinero lleva a Luba a vivir una serie de situaciones cómicas.

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Por la noche, Ira es asaltada, pero afortunadamente es salvada por un desconocido en una moto blanca.

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: Recién despedida, Lyuba encuentra un nuevo trabajo, pero sin saberlo, se convierte en cómplice de un crimen.

programme.title: Antes de los 30
programme.desc: La vida sin compromisos de Sasha se ve amenazada por su exesposo. Ira inicia una correspondencia con un preso.

programme.title: The Armstrong Williams Show
programme.desc: Interviews with important government and political leaders.

programme.title: The Taste Show by NTD
programme.desc: Chefs at their own restaurants and their cooking secrets.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Other Dimension
programme.desc: Muntaha Alramahy talks to major Russian oligarchist, Konstantin Malofeev, about Russia’s war with the West, the nuclear threats and his relationship with Putin.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Sports News
programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Hadi Badi
programme.desc: Director: Hassan El Sifi - Cast: Farid Shawki / Noura - Year of production: 1984

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Its In Our Nature

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7

Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Crave

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Betty Boop- Baby Be Good-1935
programme.desc: Betty Boop tells naughty Little Jimmy a corrective fairy tale (with herself as fairy). Part of the action is replayed in reverse.

programme.title: Campus Capers 1949
programme.desc: This one features a cat-versus-mouse football game between two cat-and-mouse colleges, called Harbard and Quinceton, and there is nothing Ivy-League about either school. The highlights are a screwy college fight-song and a statute-of-liberty misdirection football play in which the Statute of Liberty participates.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: A Car-Tune Portrait 1937
programme.desc: A symphony composer lion is determined to show the audience that cartoon characters can be more than just silly and childish by having cartoons play a symphony orchestra. Things quickly fall apart as the true nature of cartoons comes out anyways

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: The Mummy Strikes 1943
programme.desc: While investigating an egyptologist's mysterious death, Superman must battle dangerous mummies.

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: A Haunting we Will Go 1949
programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.desc: Major Crimes captain Park Kang-yoon receives special funding to carry out his investigations and lives the life of luxury with fancy sedan, high-end condo, designer suits and accessories. A rookie named Min-jae joins his unit, who happens to be very by the book. The pair becomes close as they begin investigating a new type of street drug, but Kang-yoon finds out that there is a mole within his unit, who has been compiling a case against him. programme.title: Perfect Target
programme.desc: A soldier, now a mercenary, has been brought to a foreign country by a former associate to aid in the security of that country's President. But it appears that he's been set up as the man to take the fall for the President's assassination. He escapes and joins the rebels to clear his name, and to expose the true person behind the President's assassination.

programme.title: No Hay Mas Remedio
programme.desc: Roberto, Fonso and Angel are three old men full of regrets and unfulfilled dreams. They decide to rob a drug store as a easy way to reach those unsatisfied needs before it’s too late. But what appears to be an easy job becomes an unexpected road to a complete life.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join Sean Mobley and Kyle Lenz as they tour King Corona Cigars, Bar and Coffee in Ybor City, Florida.. Check out the latest in cigars and learn what sets the lounge apart from the rest.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionados Jared and Alex to review the Foundation Aksum cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavors, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their insights into what makes this cigar stand out in the crowd.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: A hidden gem in the heart of Tampa. Known for its inviting atmosphere and extensive selection of premium cigars, Sterling offers both seasoned aficionados and curious newcomers a place to unwind. The episode dives into the lounge’s history, the art of cigar pairing, and the vibrant community it fosters.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: On this episode of Unrolled, we take a look at The Cigar Castle! General Manager Rick is here to show us this unique lounge with a wide variety of selection and an impressive humidor!

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar connoisseur Vikram Singh to review the JC Newman El Baton cigar. Together, they dive into its balanced flavors, smooth construction, and overall performance, offering their expert opinions on how this stick measures up in the world of cigars.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: On this episode of Cigar City Unrolled, owner of Long Ash Cigars - Mike- shows off his shop in the heart of Ybor city. Including his very own hand rolling station and aging room! Join us as we explore this unique style for a cigar lounge!

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The El Rojo cigar factory is the oldest working cigar factory in the United States. Join us as we take an in depth look at what it takes to turn tobacco leaves into a premium hand rolled cigar.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Tucked away on 22 St at the heart of Ybor City, The Cabrera family opened a boutique Cigar shop in 2014. Ten years later, owner Vladimir Cabrera reflects on his personal journey and family business while showcasing a vast selection of premium cigars from around the world. Tune in to discover why Tampero Cigars is a straight cut above the rest!

programme.title: Cigar TV Orginal Documentaries
programme.desc: Tampa Cigar Week 2025 offers an immersive experience for cigar enthusiasts, featuring VIP tastings and pairings with premium cigars and spirits, along with various events aimed at celebrating and educating attendees on Tampa's rich cigar culture.

programme.title: CITY TOUR - " PUNTA DEL ESTE" CON GRACIELA ALFANO (Invitada Especial)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Leo Saleh y a la icónica Graciela Alfano en un exclusivo recorrido por Punta del Este en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guests Nella Songbird, Blake Tyler, Dream Parker
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Capricorn celebrities, trending news, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Guest Lalah Hathaway
programme.desc: Lalah Hathaway is an incredible singer who’s the daughter of an incredible singer: Donny Hathaway. Her new album is called Vantaback and she’s a fascinating person to talk to about singing and music and how’her father’s influence helps her.

programme.title: Guest Teemanay
programme.desc: Teemanay speaks on his experience working with Akon, opening for Burna Boy and the globalization of Afrobeats.

programme.title: Guest Aba Blankson
programme.desc: Aba Blankson, Chief Marketing & Communication Officer of the NAACP on Vice President Kamala Harris, the elections, and the continued advocacy of the NAACP.

programme.title: Guest Raquel Willis
programme.desc: Raquel Willis is a major trans activist and the author of a powerful memoir called The Risk It Takes To Bloom. We dive deep into what it means to be trans from her coming out to her politics to her dating life. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: Garlic "Butter" Mushrooms OMG!
programme.desc: This mouth-watering dish is 100% dairy-free and yet SO buttery!

programme.title: What the Heck is a Nama Juicer?
programme.desc: The Spicy Vegans reveal their secret weapon to ultimate health.

programme.title: Pasta Dish to Rap About
programme.desc: Rapper CEO Fields makes a very simple, but scrumptious pasta dish. Anyone can do this & it's fast.

programme.title: Loving Farm Sanctuary
programme.desc: This married couple has created a paradise for animals rescued from slaughter. Find out why!

programme.title: Journey through India
programme.desc: Thomas follows Dr Sailesh Rao to India! Dr. Rao is a modern-day Gandhi, preaching as he goes!

programme.title: Compassion In Action
programme.desc: In this episode Thomas and his daughter Melody travel to Arizona to attend the 1st Vegan World 2026.

programme.title: Ahimsa & Environment: Making Peace with Nature
programme.desc: Watch Ahimsa & the Environment and learn how you can be the change you wish to see in the world.

programme.title: H.P. Lovecraft's Monster Portal
programme.desc: A cult is about to waken H.P. Lovecraft's most feared creature...

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems...

programme.title: Island of the Dolls
programme.desc: A group of people go to the legendary Island of the Dolls to learn the deadly truth...

programme.title: Derelict
programme.desc: Something has been found at the bottom of Earth's ocean. An ancient artifact that can only be described as a giant door on the sea floor, known as the Vault; an enigma, buried 19,000 feet down; but some doors should never be opened...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Portal de Monstruos de H.P. Lovecraft
programme.desc: Una secta está a punto de despertar a la criatura más temida de H.P. Lovecraft...

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Amor Interés y Muerte
programme.desc: La ambición es la causa por la que unos padres obligan a su hija menor a casarse con un hombre de 50 años para asegurar un futuro lleno de comodidades, sin embargo no contaban con que las cosas no saldrían como lo tenían planeado.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: Epitafio
programme.desc: En 1519, antes de llegar a la capital azteca México-Tenochtitlán, tres conquistadores españoles marchan hacia la cima del volcán Popocatépetl, de más de 5400 metros de altura. El ascenso es complicado, deben enfrentar la fuerza de la naturaleza y el temor a lo desconocido, pero su misión es de gran importancia para los intereses del ejército de Hernán Cortés

programme.title: Faraday
programme.desc: Faraday es un telépata especialista en fenómenos paranormales. Su novia, Pati, es una bloguera entregada a los cupcakes cuya máxima aspiración en la vida es ser famosa en internet. Alquilan un piso muy barato en el que al fin podrán independizarse, pero una vez instalados descubren que está encantado. “Faraday” es una historia de amor que supera todas las fronteras, incluidas las del Más Allá. Una comedia paranormal que tocará la fibra a todos aquellos que alguna vez han deseado ser “modernos”

programme.title: En La Ciudad Sin Brújula
programme.desc: En la ciudad sin brújula se convierte en el punto de encuentro de dos extranjeros que han perdido el rumbo hacia sus sueños. Anna una inmigrante húngara y Pascual un extranjero

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: Sanatorio
programme.desc: Rachel y Ryan son dos influencers populares que harán cualquier cosa para conseguir algunos Me gusta más y ganar el próximo desafío virtual.

programme.title: Lucero
programme.desc: Claustrofóbica, demente y puntualmente burlona, “Lucero” no sólo es una perla del fantástico de trinchera sino la enésima prueba de la capacidad de su director para, sin apenas medios y desde los márgenes de una industria fílmica como la española actual rendida al gusto indiferenciado y a la mentalidad de cadena de montaje, generar obras sugestivas, disconformes y estridentes en el mejor sentido.

programme.title: All You've Got To Do Is Don't

programme.title: God Will Work It In!

programme.title: This Is That Day

programme.title: God Chose You... Will You?
